mapper.update: update sss_deliveryrange set de_p_id = #{dePId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, range_name = #{rangeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delivery_price = #{deliveryPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where range_id = #{rangeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select range_id, de_p_id, area_id, range_name, delivery_price, comment from sss_deliveryrange
